item.title: Costa Rica halts all flights after radar failure at main airport
item.description: Authorities in Costa Rica say all flights entering and leaving the Central American country have been suspended

item.title: Iran's president says US, Israeli attacks inflicted 'grievous blow' on international trust
item.description: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian took the stage at the U_N_ to blast Israeli and U_S_ attacks in June as inflicting â€œa grievous blow upon internati...

item.title: Wall Street set to open higher after taking a break from its most recent rally a day earlier
item.description: Wall Street was poised to open with small gains a day after markets took a break from their relentless record-breaking rally

item.title: China gives up developing-country treatment in bid to boost WTO in face of Trump tariffs
item.description: China has announced it will no longer seek special treatment as a developing country in World Trade Organization agreements

item.title: Build-A-Bear keeps racking up market gains, despite tariffs, teetering mall traffic
item.description: Tariffs and years of teetering mall traffic have roiled much of the toy industry
